src:
Jadwal Operasi Dedik Setiawan Belum Dipastikan
04 Nov 2019, 19:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dedik Setiawan dipastikan bakal segera naik ke meja operasi untuk menyembuhkan cedera lututnya. Namun, sejauh ini, belum dipastikan kapan penyerang andalan Arema FC tersebut harus menjalani tindakan operasi.
"Sejauh ini belum bisa dipastikan kapan jadwal operasi Dedik," ucap Syeh Alvin Abdillah, Asisten Dokter Tim Arema, pada Bola.net.
"Pasalnya, kami juga harus menunggu jadwal dari dokter yang akan mengoperasinya. Sampai saat ini belum ada jadwalnya," sambungnya.
Namun, kendati belum bisa dipastikan, Dedik baru akan menjalani operasi setelah 6 November lusa. Hal ini, menurut Alvin, karena pemain berusia 25 tahun tersebut masih harus mengikuti acara dengan manajemen tim.
"Acara ini akan digelar pada 6 November. Jadi, operasi baru bisa dilakukan setelahnya," tutur Alvin.
Sebelumnya, Dedik mengalami masalah di ligamen lutut kanannya. Cedera ini ia dapatkan pada laga kontra Bhayangkara di Stadion Kanjuruhan Kabupaten Malang, Jumat (26/07).
Dedik sendiri sudah sempat kembali bermain usai absen. Bahkan, pada laga tunda pekan kelima Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019, kontra PSM Makassar, yang dihelat pada medio Oktober lalu, ia sukses mencetak gol.
Namun, usai pertandingan ini, cedera Dedik kambuh. Walhasil, ia dipulangkan ke Malang, dan harus absen pada dua laga tandang berikutnya, kontra Persipura Jayapura dan PS TIRA.

Apa operasi yang akan dijalani Dedik? Simak di bawah ini.
text:
Dedik Setiawan's Operational Schedule Has Not been Determined
Nov 04 2019, 19:22 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dedik Setiawan will certainly immediately go up to the operating table to heal his knee injury. However, so far, it is not certain when the mainstay of the Arema FC attacker must undergo surgery.
"So far it has not been confirmed when the Dedik surgery schedule," said Syeh Alvin Abdillah, Assistant Doctor of the Arema Team, on Bola.net.
"The reason is, we also have to wait for the schedule from the doctor who will operate it. Until now there is no schedule," he continued.
However, although not yet certain, Dedik will undergo surgery after November 6 the day after tomorrow. This, according to Alvin, because the 25-year-old player still has to attend the event with team management.
"This event will be held on November 6. So, the new operation can be carried out afterwards," Alvin said.
Previously, Dedik had problems in his right knee ligament. This injury he got in the match counter Bhayangkara at Kanjuruhan Stadium Malang Regency, Friday (07/26).
Dedik himself had once returned to play after missing. In fact, in the match postponed for the fifth week of the Shopee Liga 1 season 2019, contra PSM Makassar, which was held in mid-October, he successfully scored.
However, after this match, Dedik's injury recurred. As a result, he was sent back to Malang, and had to be absent in the next two away games, against Persipura Jayapura and PS TIRA.

What surgery will Dedik undergo? See below.
